casebody.data:
ROCKWOOD & COMPANY, Appellee, v. NORTHWESTERN FIRE & MARINE INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant. No. 179. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 16, 1931. See, also, 26 F.(2d) 824. William F. Purdy, of New York City (George Y. A. MeCloskey, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Herman Goldman, of New York City (Forrest E. Single and Thomas H. Middleton, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
